title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7201.3 - Confidentiality and disclosure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7201.3 - Confidentiality and disclosure

State Regulations

Confidential HIV-related information obtained by any person
in the discharge of their official duties or in the course of their employment
by or appointment to the commission, or by any member or agent thereof, or any
member of the medical review board or member of the citizens' policy and
complaint review council may be disclosed only pursuant to Public Health Law, article 27-F, its implementing regulations, Part 7064 of this Title, and this

Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7201.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
